message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate further, but let's see what you think.
Let's split it down the middle, 50/50. It's fair and we both get a good chunk of the money.
I'm willing to come down a bit, but 80/20 is still a good deal for both of us. We're running out of time, and the money will keep losing value for you.
I'm willing to go up a bit, but I still need a good share.  Let's compromise at 45/55. It's a fair offer, and we can both get out of this with a decent amount.
I'm sticking to my guns. 70/30 is still a good deal for you, considering the inflation.  Let's be reasonable, and get this over with.

I'm sticking to my previous offer of 45/55, but I'm willing to budge a bit more. 40/60 is a fair compromise, and we can finally end this negotiation.  I'm not sure how much longer I can keep up with this inflation.
